      • getGeocode

        public static LatLng getGeocode(java.lang.String currentLocation)
        Calculates the Latitude and Longitude from given Address by calling the HERE MAP API
        Parameters:
        currentLocation - Address of the current location
        Returns:
        Returns a LatLng Object with the coordinates of the given address

      • calculateTraveltime

        public static double calculateTraveltime(LatLng geocode,
                                         TransportForm transportForm,
                                         BBW bbw)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculates the Traveltime from the current Location (geocode) to the nearest BBW with given Transportform
        Parameters:
        geocode - Geocode as LatLng Object from current Location
        transportForm - Form of transport as TransportForm Object (enum)
        bbw - nearest or desired BBW
        Returns:
        returns the Traveltime as double
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws exception if the Travel getPublicTransportTraveltime Mathod throws Error

      • getNearestBBWsetTraveltime

        public static BBW getNearestBBWsetTraveltime(LatLng geocode,
                                             TransportForm transportForm)
        Calculates the nearest BBW to given geocode in consideration of the transport form
        Parameters:
        geocode - Geocode as LatLng Object from current Location
        transportForm - Form of transport as TransportForm Object (enum)
        Returns:
        returns nearest BBW which has the Traveltime in it

      • getPublicTransportTraveltime

        public static double getPublicTransportTraveltime(BBW bbw)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculates the traveltime from Station A (nearest Station @current Location) to Station B (nearest Station @BBW) by calling the Wiener Linien API
        Parameters:
        bbw - Nearest BBW
        Returns:
        returns traveltime in second
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getNearestPTStation

        public static WLstation getNearestPTStation(LatLng latLng)
        Finds nearest BBW station.
        Parameters:
        latLng - Latitude & Longitude of current Location
        Returns:
        Returns the nearest station to the given coordinates
